description: '''Arthur William''' "'''Big Boy'''" '''Crudup''' (August 24, 1905 – March 28, 1974) was an American [[Delta blues]] singer, songwriter and guitarist. He is best known, outside blues circles, for his songs "[[That's All Right]]" (1946), "[[My Baby Left Me]]" and "So Glad You're Mine", later recorded by [[Elvis Presley]] and other artists.
